summary.Title: Fence fitters, Northern Norway
summary.Presentation:
Tojo AS, Sørreisa, is a leading company in Northern Norway within installing fences at for example railroads, industrial areas etc.
For our projects we are looking for 6 fence fitters.
<

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Tojo AS, Sørreisa, is a leading company in Northern Norway within installing fences at for example railroads, industrial areas etc.

For our projects we are looking for 6 fence fitters.

You need to be flexible since we have very different projects in the whole of Northern Norway.

No formal education needed since we are learning you on the job the first 2 months. After this period, you will be employed for the whole period.

Arrangement from Easter to Christmas 2022, with good possibilities to return the coming years.

Shift job: 6 weeks work, 3 weeks off.

(If you want to travel home in your free period you have to pay your travel expenses yourself)

You need to be in good physical health to work as a fence fitter.

It is an advantage with job experience from for example forestry, carpenter etc.

You must like working outside in different weather conditions.

We expect from you that you can work in a team and live together during the working period.

We arrange housing at the projects. You are responsible to keep the housing tidy and clean.

It is an advantage if you understand some English.

Salary from 198,30 NOK pr hour (appr. 20 EURO pr hour)

Job start as soon as possible.

For more information and your application, please contact:

Thorgeir Sørstrøm (CEO), thorgeir@tojo.no, +47 9286 1019

as soon as possible.

(from NAV EURES Norway)
